title: Listener Voice Mail Friday
description:
It’s a special edition of the Jalen & Jacoby Podcast as the entire show is dedicated to listener voice mails. The guys answer all the burning questions you’ve been dying to ask, such as: is it ok to continue hooking up with your ex-girlfriend after breaking up? Is it ok to switch your fan allegiance once you become an adult? And, should you be showering before you get into bed at night? Speaking of which, many of Jacoby’s bad habits are laid bare as the callers expose his darker side…all that and more.  
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: J&J: Whole Show Dedicated To Listener Voicemails!
